title: Is it worth it to buy a 4G smartphone this year, or should I have to wait until 5G arrives in India? - Quora

response.answer_text: Wait till 5G arrives. I myself is using 3G happily as it's comfortable and I doesn't need to give up my current handset. The technology 4G is for people full of unimportant things. Does they even know the affect of using too much using social networking is depressing.
